synopsis.text: Years after being driven from the earth by colossal, magical armored insects, humans now reside in floating cities, relying on aerial combat wizards to defend them from the menacing creatures below. Once hailed as the "Black Master Swordsman" and an elite member of the S128 special team, Kanata Age now finds himself labeled a traitor and reassigned to instruct the struggling E601 squad. Consisting of three unique girls – Misora Whitale, Lecty Eisenach, and Rico Flamel – each with their own quirks and shortcomings, Kanata must overcome their challenges and restore his reputation by transforming this mismatched team into formidable Sky Wizards.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
